# Module: tf.audio



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


## Functions

[`decode_wav(...)`](../tf/audio/decode_wav): Decode a 16-bit PCM WAV file to a float tensor.

[`encode_wav(...)`](../tf/audio/encode_wav): Encode audio data using the WAV file format.
